maqras.text: On goh uro dar hole ki [za'if va] ʙemor ʙud ʙa sarzamini xusk [va ʙegijoh] afkandem
Va ʙar [sari] u ʙutai kadu rujondem [to az soja va mevahojas ʙahra girad]
Va [duʙora] uro ʙa suji sad hazor nafar jo ʙestar [ʙa risolat] firistodem
Pas, onon imon ovardand va Mo niz to muddate [az ne'mathoi zindagi] ʙahramandason soxtem
Pas, az eson [musrikon] ʙipurs, ojo duxtarho ʙaroi Parvardigori tu va pisarho ʙaroi onhost
Ojo Mo faristagonro duxtar ofaridem va onho huzur dostand
Ogoh ʙos! Onon az [rui tuhmat va] duruƣgui
megujand: «Alloh taolo farzand dorad» va, jaqinan, duruƣ megujand
Ojo [Alloh taolo] duxtaronro ʙar pisaron tarceh dodaast
Sumoro ci sudaast? Ci guna hukm mekuned
Ojo [nameandesed va] pand namegired
Ojo [ʙar iddaoi ʙotili xes] daleli ravsane dored
Pas, agar rostgued, kitoʙatonro ʙijovared
[Musrikon] ʙajni U [Alloh taolo] va faristagon, xesovandi qoil sudaand; dar hole ki faristagon ʙa jaqin medonand, ki [musrikon ruzi qijomat ʙaroi hisoʙrasi] ehzor mesavand
Alloh taolo az on ci [musrikon] tavsif mekunand, munazzah ast
[Mardum dar tavsifi Parvardigor, suxani gazof megujand] magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
Pas, sumo [musrikon] va on ci meparasted
[hargiz] gumrohgari [kase az dini haq] nested
Magar on ki [ʙa taqdiri ilohi] ahli duzax ʙosad
Va [faristagon megujand]: « Hec jak az mo nest, magar on ki maqomi musaxxase [dar pesgohi ilohi] dorad
Moem, ki [ʙaroi parastis va nijois ʙa dargohi Parvardigor] ʙa saf istodaem
Va ʙe tardid, moem, ki tasʙehgui [U] hastem»
Va [kofiron, pes az ʙi'sat] hamvora meguftand
«Agar kitoʙe az [kitoʙhoi osmonii] pesinijon nazdamon ʙud
jaqinan, az ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo mesudem»
Ammo [hangome ki pajomʙar ʙo Qur'on ʙa sujason omad, haqqonijati] onro inkor kardand; pas, ʙa zudi [naticai in korasonro] xohand donist
Va hatman suxanoni Mo dar ʙorai ʙandagoni firistodaamon az pes sodir sudaast
Onon, hatman, az coniʙi Mo jori sudaand
Va ʙe tardid, laskari Mo piruzand
Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] to muddate az onon [musrikon] ruj ʙigardon
Va ononro [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] ʙingar; pas, ʙa zudi xud [niz naticai kufrasonro] xohand did
Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
On goh ki [azoʙi ilohi] ʙar xonahojason furud ojad, ci ʙad ast ʙomdodi husdorjoftagon
Va to muddate az onon ruj ʙigardon
Va ononro [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] ʙingar; pas, ʙa zudi xud [niz naticai kufrasonro] xohand did
Pok va munazzah ast Parvardigorat - Parvardigori izzat va qudrat-az on ci [musrikon ʙa duruƣ] vasf mekunand
Va salom ʙar pajomʙaron
Va sipos [va sitois] az oni Alloh taolo- Parvardigori cahonijon- ast
Sod. Savgand ʙa Qur'oni pandomuz [ki Alloh taolo hec sarike nadorad]
Ammo kofiron giriftori taassuʙ [-u cohilijat] va sitezand
Ci ʙisjor naslhoi kofirro pes az onon halok kardem, ki [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] farjod mezadand, ammo [on zamon digar] hangomi nacot naʙud
Musrikon az in ki ʙimdihandae az mijoni xudason ʙa suroƣason omadaast, iʙrozi sigifti kardand va guftand: «In mard codugaru duruƣgust
Ojo ʙa coji ma'ʙudoni muxtalif ma'ʙude jagona qaror dodaast? Voqean, kori aciʙe ast»

Buzurgonason ʙa po xostand [va ʙa pajravoni xud guftand]: «Biraved va ʙar [parastisu hifzi] ma'ʙudonaton istodagari kuned. Be tardid, [Muhammad ʙo] in kor xostaast [ki sumoro gumroh kunad va xudro ʙa rajosat ʙirasonad]
Mo in [nazarijai tavhid]-ro hatto dar oini masehijat ham nasnidaem. In suxan cuz duruƣ [cize] nest
Ojo az mijoni [hamai] mo Qur'on ʙa u nozil sudaast»? [Cunin nest, ki onon megujand] Balki onon dar [asli] vahji Man tardid dorand va hanuz azoʙi Maro nacasidaand
Ojo gancinahoi rahmati Parvardigori sikastnopaziri ʙaxsandaat nazdason hast
Ojo farmonravoi osmonho va zamin va ʙajni onho hastand? [Agar cunin ast] Bo vasoil [-u imkonoti xud ʙa osmon] avc ʙigirand [va monei nuzuli vahj gardand]
[In kofiron] Laskare sikastxurda az cumla soiri guruhho [va ahzoʙi muxolifi pajomʙaron] hastand
Pes az onon niz qavmi Nuh va Od va Fir'avni sohiʙsipoh niz [pajomʙaroni Moro] takziʙ kardand
Qavmi Samud va qavmi Lut va ashoʙi Ajka [qavmi Suajʙ] niz az on guruhho ʙudand [ki pajomʙaronro takziʙ kardand]
Har jak [az in guruhho] pajomʙaron [-i xud]-ro takziʙ kardand va kajfari man [dar mavridason] tahaqquq joft
Inon faqat ʙonge sahmnokro intizor mekasand, ki hec ʙozgaste nadorad
[Bo tamasxur] Megujand: «Parvardigoro, pes az faro rasidani ruzi hisoʙ ʙahrai moro [az azoʙ] ʙa sitoʙ ʙideh»
[Ej pajomʙar] Dar ʙaroʙari guftorason sikeʙo ʙos va az Dovud, ʙandai tavonmandi Mo jod kun, ki hamvora [ʙo tavʙa va ancomi kori xajr ʙa dargohi mo] ʙozmegast
Mo kuhhoro ʙa u ʙa xidmat gumostem, ki hamnavo ʙo u somgohon va ʙomdodon [Parvardigorro] tasʙeh meguftand
Va parandagonro [niz ʙa xidmat gumostem], ki gird meomadand va hamagi muteas ʙudand [va ʙo vaj dar zikri Parvardigor hamovozi mekardand]
Mo farmonravoiasro ustuvor namudem va ʙa u pajomʙari va kalome fajsalaʙaxs ato kardem
